ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I counted on meeting my Reckoning.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I was certain I'll be given my account."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily I was sure that I would be handed over my account.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I was sure that the record of my deeds would be shown to me".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “I was certain that I will confront my account.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Surely, I did believe that I shall meet my account!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely I knew that I shall meet my account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Certainly I thought that I should encounter my reckoning.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Surely I knew that I should have to meet my reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely, I knew that I should meet my reckoning,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily I was sure that I should be a meeter of my reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed I knew that I will encounter my account [of deeds].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: I did really understand that my Account would (One Day) reach me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Surely, I did believe that I shall meet my Account!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, I knew that I should come to my reckoning'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I knew I would be held accountable.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:20] I was truly certain that I would encounter my account’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Surely I knew) and was certain (that I should have to meet my reckoning.
